sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect:
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as [list types of information collected]. We also automatically collect certain information when you access or use RiceReach.

sections.heading: 2. Use of Information:
sections.content: We may use the information collected for [purposes like providing and improving the app, personalizing your experience, and sending notifications]. Your information will not be shared with third parties except as outlined in this Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: 3. Security:
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet or method of storage is 100% secure.
